name: Unscrambled eggs
description:
Unscramble the eggs.

The string given to your function has had an "egg" inserted directly after each consonant. 
You need to return the string before it became eggcoded.

## Example

```javascript
unscrambleEggs("Beggegeggineggneggeregg")  =>  "Beginner"
//             "B---eg---in---n---er---"
```

Kata is supposed to be for beginners to practice reggular eggspressions, so commenting would be appreciated.
